channel.title: Dragonholic Paid Chapters
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for paid chapters across mapped novels.

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.description:
Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and “accidentally” provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn’t easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted.

Xu Yitong sighed, “What kind of people like him? Don’t they have enough homework to do?”

…

Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin:

[You’ll laugh, but it turns out I’m the kind of person who likes him : ) ]

[Don’t piss off my husband again, okay?]

“My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint.”

Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted

Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge

Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint

Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.nameextend: ***I always feel like you are seducing me again***
item.description:
At the princess’s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other’s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
“I’ll go first…”
“I’ll head that way…”

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess’s maid and the second prince’s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: “What don’t you just go to the princess?”
Lu Wuyou endured: “I think the second prince is not bad either.”
Helan Ci: “If we keep talking, we’ll only end up hurting each other!”
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: “Then let it be a mutual destruction.”
Helan Ci: “…?”

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband’s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, “…Can you handle this?”
Lu Wuyou replied, “Even if I can’t, I have to. Who told me to marry you— I’m going to be a powerful minister. I can’t fall here.”
Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.nameextend: ***Miss Helan, are you trying to seduce me?***
